alert.note: Alert for Howell; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 23 at 11:20PM CDT until March 23 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN HOWELL AND TEXAS COUNTIES... At 1118 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Houston to near Willow Springs, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mountain Grove, Mountain View, Willow Springs, Cabool, Houston, Pomona, Summersville, Raymondville, Huggins, Peace Valley, Arroll, Bucyrus, Elk Creek, Eunice, Yukon, Hartshorn, Clear Springs, Solo, Pine Crest and Simmons. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
